p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

p_99: Each resident a is given a Dermatoscope to use for the entire time in the program. Each class (2 per class)has an Il Duomo head that is incorporated into didactics to teach flaps/grafts, skin closures and suturing skills. Residents have 1 full day of Didactics per week. Dedicated study time while on call.
